TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit InternalTypeHelper extends System.Object

summary.span: 由 WPF XAML 编译器在内部使用的抽象类，用于支持使用内部类型。

span.span: Abstract class used internally by the WPF XAML compiler to support the use of internal types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类不应由 WPF XAML 标记编译器之外的任何对象使用。The class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler. 编译 XAML 文件时, 可以使用公共类型, 但也可以使用受限于对内部类型进行代码访问时存在的相同限制的内部类型。When compiling a XAML file, you can use public types, but you can also use internal types subject to the same limitations that exist on code access to internal types. 支持对标记的内部访问级别类型的支持。 enables support of internal access level types for markup. 这涉及到编译器创建派生自的生成类并实现其成员。This involves the compiler creating a generated class that derives from and implements its members. 生成的类存在于安全和访问上下文中, 这样, 仅为共享内部访问专门特性化的同一个程序集或其他程序集可以引用生成的类, 因此还可以引用内部类型。The generated class exists in a security and access context such that only the same assembly or other assemblies specifically attributed for shared internal access can reference the generated class and thus the internal types.

span.span: XAML Security Considerations

MemberSignature.Value: protected InternalTypeHelper ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: InternalTypeHelper();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

The target where the handler is attached.
The event handler.

summary.span: 在派生（生成）类中重写时，会将事件处理程序委托附加到内部事件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived (generated) class, attaches an event handler delegate to an internal event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类不应由 WPF XAML 标记编译器之外的任何对象使用。The class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler.
